basics.name: Kelly Nelson
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: My cumulation of life decisions has me as a web developer with one eye always on design. I currently am very interested in work that has me building in React based code. I am also attempting world dominance by doing freelance architectural photography.

work.summary: Acquire, design and build out a 1964 Airstream into a mobile walk-in coffee shop, manage the business operations of a retail coffee shop including purchasing, accounting, inventory planning, cash handling, enthusiastic hospitality, customer education and marketing.

Administration/support of various systems including Windows based desktops, servers (including virtual), Active Directory, iOS/Android devices, VOIP system (Avaya), Building Security systems (Kantech), Asset Inventory system (Footprints), LAN hardware (Juniper), Video Surveillance (Milestone/IQInvision), various industry related applications (Clevest, TWACS, Itron), server room redesign including redundant power distribution, rack space design, cable/patch panel management and environmental monitoring.

Dedicated on-site contractor for EDS at Weyerhaeuser doing Windows 2000/NT domain user account creations, deletions and administration using Active Directory, Exchange mailbox creations, deletions and administration using Active Directory and Exchange Administrator, group security permissions, share creations, break/fix resolutions, documentation.
Administration/support of enterprise Windows based desktops (2,000), servers (100+), NT accounts, printers, Exchange accounts, IIS, asset tracking, etc.

volunteer.summary: Help guide 7-9 year olds through a week of camp activities while teaching biblical concepts in ways they can understand and utilize after leaving camp.
Help guide older teenagers through a week of camp activities while teaching biblical concepts that will help them navigate the responsibilities that come with the transition to adulthood.

courses: How to Use Git and Github

portfolio.name: Monopoly Calculator
portfolio.summary: Web app for Monopoly to caluclate the total net worth of a Monopoly game winner. Built with Create-React-App and deployed through Surge.sh

portfolio.name: Hymns Background
portfolio.summary: Web app that allows for page and title searching of hymns from various Church of God hymnals. Built with MeanJS scaffolding and deployed to EC2 on AWS using a Bitnami stack.

portfolio.name: Kelly Nelson Photography
portfolio.summary: My own website displaying my photography work through a Flickr API. Built with Create-React-App and deployed to Surge.sh
